# List.controller.js

```javascript
sap.ui.define(["sap/ui/core/mvc/Controller","sap/ui/model/Filter","sap/ui/model/FilterOperator"],function(e,t,r){"use strict";return e.extend("sap.btp.sapui5.controller.List",{handleSearch:function(e){var i=[];var a=e.getParameter("query");if(a&&a.length>0){i.push(new t({path:"ProductName",operator:r.Contains,value1:a}))}var o=this.getView().byId("list");var n=o.getBinding("items");n.filter(i)},handleListItemPress:function(e){var t=sap.ui.core.UIComponent.getRouterFor(this);var r=e.getSource().getBindingContext().getProperty("ProductID");t.navTo("detail",{productId:r})}})});
```
